text: Telê Santana (July 26, 1931 – April 21, 2006) was a former Brazilian football player and manager. ==Managerial statistics== Team Nation From To Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Team Nation From To G W D L F A GD Win % Fluminense 1969 1969 44 23 11 10 66 40 +26 Atlético Mineiro 1970 1972 149 76 46 27 223 117 +105 São Paulo 1973 1973 30 11 13 6 30 24 +6 Atlético Mineiro 1973 1975 151 82 37 32 243 125 +118 Botafogo 1976 1976 21 11 4 6 29 17 +12 Gremio 1976 1978 130 79 31 20 249 86 +163 Palmeiras 1979 1980 56 30 15 11 105 51 +54 Brazil 2 April 1980 5 July 1982 38 29 6 3 74 25 +49 Al- Ahli 1983 1985 52 32 14 6 74 29 +45 Brazil 2 June 1985 21 June 1986 17 11 4 2 45 12 +33 Atlético Mineiro 1987 1988 102 52 34 11 143 72 +71 Flamengo 1988 1989 62 37 15 10 74 39 +45 Fluminense 1989 1989 28 9 6 13 24 35 -11 Palmeiras 1990 1990 47 22 12 13 54 31 +23 São Paulo 1990 1996 391 191 114 86 603 375 +228 Total 1,318 695 362 261 2,036 1,078 +955 ==Honours== ===Player honours=== ;Club *1951 -
